author: tmiychao
content: On Monday, June 12, 4:30PM UTC, we will hold a town hall to answer all your questions about EPF! Join the call on Monday to learn more about EPF and chat about your project ideas before you apply. Link and all the info in the application blog post https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/06/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-fourth-apps-open
